document.full_text: the heat, which played without an injured dwyane wade, fell a half-game back of the boston celtics in the race for the no. 2 seed.
document.title: n.b.a. roundup: heat falls to bucks and slips in the east
lines_and_colors: the heat, which played without an injured dwyane wade, fell a half-game back of the boston celtics in the race for the no. 2 seed.
